humification_const.Description: Proportion of degraded carbon that is partitioned to humus-like organic matter; Ctool value for soil without clay

spinupYearsBaseLine.Description: Number of years that is used in Ctool spinup of scenario if using adaptation (only if spinup is used)

ErrorToleranceYield.Description: Maximum difference between expected and modelled DM yield of crops

ErrorToleranceGrazing.Description: Maximum proportional difference between grazed crop DM and grazed crop intake

adaptationTimePeriod.Description: Minimum length of the period over which flows will be calculated when using adaptation mode

lockSoilTypes.Description: If true, soil pools will be preserved for all crop sequences between adaptation and projection modes
